errors.error_description: Missing essential dependency information - Redis not properly mentioned as a requirement
correction_candidates: Peering Manager is written with the [Django](https://www.djangoproject.com/) with a [PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org) database, [Redis](https://redis.io/) for caching/task processing and requires Python 3 with some dependencies to run.

Peering Manager is written with the [Django](https://www.djangoproject.com/) framework, requires a [PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org) database, [Redis](https://redis.io/) server, and Python 3 with additional dependencies.
Peering Manager requires [Django](https://www.djangoproject.com/), [PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org), [Redis](https://redis.io/), and Python 3 to run properly.
Peering Manager dependencies include [Django](https://www.djangoproject.com/) web framework, [PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org) database server, and Python 3 runtime.
errors.golden_answer: Peering Manager is written with the [Django](https://www.djangoproject.com/) with a [PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org) database, [Redis](https://redis.io/) for caching/task processing and requires Python 3 with some dependencies to run.
